summary: Three superheroes attempt to reclaim the stolen lease of a uranium mine.
cast: George Martin|Sal Borgese|Brad Harris|Femi Benussi|Pasquale Simeoli|Pilar Zorrilla|Frank Braña|Gianni Pulone|Rafael Albaicín|Julián Benito Navarro|Pedro Rodríguez de Quevedo|Juan Taberner|Tomás Torres|Leonardo San José Varanda
title: Los tres supermen en la selva
